definition: bossy and domineering/throwing one's weight about
abbr. for 揚州|扬州[Yang2 zhou1]/surname Yang
to raise/to hoist/the action of tossing or winnowing/scattering (in the wind)/to flutter/to propagate

sentences.english: People live this time, should live arrogant.
sentences.chinese: 人就活這一次，理應活的飛揚跋扈。

sentences.english: Chiang's officers and soldiers in Fuhsun city were very arrogant.
sentences.chinese: 蔣軍官兵在撫順飛揚跋扈。

sentences.english: He walks with an imperious look.
sentences.chinese: 他走的時候臉上飛揚跋扈的樣子。

sentences.english: He is a domineering sort of fellow.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個飛揚跋扈的人。

sentences.english: Mick's always throwing his weight about and telling people what to do.
sentences.chinese: 米克老是飛揚跋扈地告訴人們幹什麼事情。

definition: to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: lit. small belly, chicken's gut (idiom); narrow-minded/petty
lit. to bring a bramble and ask for punishment (idiom)/fig. to offer sb a humble apology
to have no sense of shame/brazen
to refute/to demolish (an argument, theory etc)
clever and eloquent (idiom); fluent/having the gift of the gab
